lead_paragraph: David Beckham was ruled out of the Los Angeles Galaxy’s game against the Mexican team Pachuca yesterday. Beckham has been struggling to shake off a lingering ankle injury, and Frank Yallop, the Galaxy’s head coach, said he needed more time to recover.
